content:
TERM: Learning Metrics

DEFINITION:
Tracks autonomy_rate, patterns_stored, llm_calls_saved, avg_compression_ratio, avg_confidence to govern capture and routing.

[From Codebase]: ```python
{
    "error_types_learned": ["unsatisfied_precondition", "temporal_violation"],
    "improvement_over_time": True,  # Success rate increasing
    "recurring_error_rate": 0.05,  # 5% of errors are same type
    "error_education_effectiveness": 0.82  # 82% improve after feedback
}
```

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
Aggregates autonomy_rate, patterns_stored, llm_calls_saved, avg_compression_ratio, avg_confidence; feeds policy decisions.

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
Reported autonomy_rate climbing to 0.32 with 27 LLM calls saved this week.

CATEGORY: SystemCapability

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: Telemetry; used_by: KnowledgegraphrouteR, PromotionPolicY; reported_to: VettingagenT
